name: SPARKLING STALLION
description:
* * * SPARKLING * STALLION * * *

WELCOME TO CANDY KINGDOM! EVERYTHING HERE S P A R K L E S ! ! !

HOWEVER, THERE IS ONE UNICORN WHO JUST HATES IT ALL. THE PASTEL COLORS, THE GLITTER GETTING EVERYWHERE, AND THE NEVERENDING MUSIC IN THE BACKGROUND.

TO MAKE THINGS WORSE, THERE ARE A BUNCH OF ANNOYING CRITTERS THAT WANT NOTHING MORE THAN TO MAKE THE UNICORN MISERABLE BY TRYING W A Y TOO HARD TO CHEER HIM UP!!!

NOW HE MUST FIGHT TO STAY GRUMPY AMIDST OVERTLY CHEERFUL CRITTERS, BOMBS THAT GET GLITTER E V E R Y W H E R E, AND WEIRD FLOATING PLATFORMS!!!

WILL OUR GRUMPY UNICORN MAKE IT TO THE PLACE WHERE HE CAN SULK IN PEACE?!

OR WILL HE BE DOOMED TO BE HAPPY FOREVER?!

Made for the Seattle AIE Winter Game Jam 2021.

PROGRAMMING

Jasmine Kaeseberg

Edgar Gunther

DESIGN

Ryan Ditzler

Brian Shinn

ART/MUSIC

Adeline Nicholson

Connor Nolan

Jaden Posada

Meladie Scroggs

Bella Westrom
